title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, August 9, 2021
description: It is the birthday of science fiction author Daniel Keyes (1927). Keyes authored "Flowers for Algernon” which won the Hugo Award for Best Short Story in 1960.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It is the birthday of science fiction author Daniel Keyes (1927). Keyes authored "Flowers for Algernon” which won the Hugo Award for Best Short Story in 1960.
